backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing eligibility confirmation, community profiles, mentorship browsing, and basic contact handling with access control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to code files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining a light/dark butterfly‑themed color palette and CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, root mount point, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with public routes, authenticated routes wrapped in AppShell, and auth/eligibility gating logic.
frontend/src/backendExtensions.d.ts: TypeScript module augmentation adding post, comment, and report types plus future backend method signatures.
frontend/src/components/auth/AgeGate.tsx: Age‑verification component requiring 18+ confirmation and triggering eligibility storage via backend mutation.
Provides the main app layout with navigation, content container, and themed footer.
frontend/src/components/nav/AuthedNav.ts: Renders the authenticated navigation bar with links, admin check, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login, logout, and login status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing identity loading, login, logout, and status state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend operations like eligibility, profiles, mentors, contacts, and reporting.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Connections.tsx: Displays a placeholder UI for managing user connections with a card-based layout.
frontend/src/pages/Directory.tsx: Implements a directory with mentorship filters and a mentor listing fetched via React Query.
frontend/src/pages/Feed.tsx: Displays a placeholder community feed with a disabled post creation button and informational text.
frontend/src/pages/Guidelines.tsx: Shows community guidelines across several themed cards covering respect, safety, community building, and reporting.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with hero section, login CTA, and feature highlights introducing the platform.
frontend/src/pages/Moderation.tsx: Checks admin permissions and displays either an access denied message or a placeholder moderation panel.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetail.tsx: Placeholder page indicating that post details and comments will appear once backend integration is complete.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileMe.tsx: Provides profile setup and editing functionality, loading user data and allowing updates via a form.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileView.tsx: Displays another user's profile with option to send a connection request and handles loading and missing-profile states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending typography, container queries, animations, colors, and theme settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including versioning, feature list, issues, and required image assets.
